alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock; Lee; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 6:16PM CDT until August 06 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lee County in east central Alabama... Central Bullock County in southeastern Alabama... North central Barbour County in southeastern Alabama... Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Beans Mill to near Hardaway, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phenix City, Opelika, Union Springs, Hurtsboro, Midway, Smiths, Smiths Station, Uchee, Spring Hill, Beans Mill, Franklin Field, Guerryton, Bleecker, Russell County Sports Complex, Seale, Comer, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Ladonia, Griffen Mill and Goat Rock Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
